name: economic-intelligence-mcp
description: MCP App Server for economic data — interest rates, jobs, inflation, housing, bank health. Interactive charts and cross-source analysis from FRED, BLS, Treasury, and FDIC data.

fred_api_key.title: FRED API Key
fred_api_key.description: Free API key from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/docs/api/api_key.html — takes 30 seconds to get one.

bls_api_key.title: BLS API Key (optional)
bls_api_key.description: Free API key from https://www.bls.gov/developers/ — increases rate limits from 25 to 500 requests/day.

tools.name: open_economic_app
tools.description: Open the interactive Economic Intelligence dashboard — charts, recession gauge, signals, data explorer

tools.name: econ_interest_rates
tools.description: Current and historical interest rates — Fed funds, 10Y/30Y treasury, mortgage rates, yield curve

tools.name: econ_inflation
tools.description: CPI, PCE, and core inflation trends with year-over-year analysis

tools.name: econ_jobs
tools.description: Employment data — unemployment rate, nonfarm payrolls, wage growth, job openings

tools.name: econ_housing
tools.description: Housing data — starts, permits, home prices, mortgage rates, affordability index

tools.name: econ_bank_health
tools.description: FDIC bank health indicators — capital ratios, problem bank count, failure history

tools.name: econ_gdp
tools.description: GDP growth — nominal, real, and annualized growth rate

tools.name: econ_treasury
tools.description: Treasury rates, yield spreads, and federal debt levels

tools.name: econ_compare
tools.description: Compare any two economic data series on the same chart with correlation analysis

tools.name: econ_search
tools.description: Search FRED for any economic data series by keyword

tools.name: econ_signal_history
tools.description: How economic signals have changed over time — backfilled 12 months on first run

tools.name: econ_changes
tools.description: What economic signals shifted recently — compares latest values to prior snapshots

tools.name: econ_alerts
tools.description: Active economic alerts — threshold crossings, trend reversals, recession probability shifts
